lead_paragraph: Images of the dazed and injured child have quickly made him an emblem of the harrowing misery of Syria’s five-year-old civil war.

headline.print_headline: An Injured Child, Symbol of Syrian Suffering
headline.main: How Omran Daqneesh, 5, Became a Symbol of Aleppo’s Suffering

snippet: Images of the dazed and injured child have quickly made him an emblem of the harrowing misery of Syria’s five-year-old civil war....
abstract: Image of injured and visibly shaken Syrian Omran Daqneesh, 5-year-old pulled from wreckage of building in Aleppo targeted by Syrian government or Russian airstrike, floods social media around world; emotional response from public underscores frustration with inability to of global leaders to resolve conflict that has gone on for five years and taken thousands and thousands of young lives.
